descriptionHTML:
"WeatherPro answers the question - what's the best Android Weather app?" Brighthub *****

This reliable, award winning weather app, offers unrivalled, high-quality, detailed information including:

• 3-hourly forecasts for the week ahead including temperature, wind direction and speed, air pressure, precipitation amount and probability and relative humidity
• View forecast as a graph for an alternative, easy to read outlook
• Worldwide alerts and warning levels for extreme weather
• Global satellite and animated radar for the USA, Australia and much of Europe
• Unlimited favourite locations plus “My location” to automatically show the weather where you are
• Connection to your personal weather stations, in partnership with Netatmo
• NEW: WeatherPro and wearable technology! Connection to your smartwatch (requires Android Wear)
• Additional features: Weather photo, Weather news, Weather reports for over 2 million locations worldwide
• Customizable Widgets (choose your own colour, size, transparency, location, gradient etc.), Live Wallpaper with current weather images and App2SD compatibility
• Explore the benefits of MeteoGroup’s other apps by connecting directly to the 3D globe on MeteoEarth and our severe weather app AlertsPro!
• NO adverts

Already the most comprehensive weather app on the market, WeatherPro also has a Premium subscription option which takes the service to an even more advanced level. WeatherPro Premium offers everything found on the standard app plus:

• Hourly forecasts for 2 weeks ahead
• Windtheme: Windtheme helps users find the optimum wind conditions, by changing the entire interface of WeatherPro to show a central focus on wind data.
• Stunning, high resolution weather maps with multiple layers of advanced weather information including precipitation type radar in Europe, radar forecasts, heat maps, lightning strikes and cloud cover forecasts.
• Ski Weather for over 900 resorts in 17 countries and Beach Weather with UV Index and water temperatures for the Mediterranean, Caribbean and other popular holiday destinations.
• And more…

The extensive list of standard and Premium features has simply got too long to list here so, for full details, please visit www.weatherpro.eu. One subscription covers Premium services on WeatherPro, MeteoEarth and AlertsPro.

For status updates please follow @WeatherPro.

WeatherPro is one of the few weather apps to be developed by true weather professionals – find out more about MeteoGroup, Europe’s largest independent weather company at www.meteogroup.com.

topReviews.reviewText: looks like your latest update once again screwed up the my location update on the widget!? can't believe that you are making the same mistakes more than once? without my location update working the app is useless to me 😢!!

Cool idea but don't know how to read it and it appears to display wrong temperatures.  Finally you can turn off premium features so every other click doesn't ask for money!  I used to love this app and shelved it until this watch feature came out.  If you bought the tablet and meteoearth apps u will regret to find out it doesn't sync favorite locations. Meteoearth is nearly useless without fav locations inputted.

This weekend the BBC said the weather for the south coast around Brighton, UK would be cloudy this whole week, but I depended on the more positive WeatherPro which indicated 4 hours sunshine forecast for Tuesday. Then on Monday this changed to 4/5 hours of sunshine on Wednesday instead. Then on Tuesday this changed to Thursday. The BBC, UK Met Office all seem to contradict WeatherPro. Think I'll be taking a close look at uninstalling if this keeps on happening.
topReviews.reviewTitle: Weather forecast contradicts BBC and UK Met office

topReviews.reviewText: Pretty slick-looking weather app. Useful rain, wind and temp forecast charts. Nice to know what the weather is like outside when I'm sat in the office 100m from the nearest window.

Overall happy with the purchase but for a paid app you should be able to zoom in with radar and have a much clearer landscape view  than the generic satellite images provided. To cluttered, needs to be simplified as way to much information is crammed into one screen making it difficult to understand unless you know what your looking at. With some fine tuning this could be a great app! Radar usability is moving in the right direction with respect to the latest upgrade however is still not there yet.

Since the last update the app forces a process called WearData to be kept permanently in the background, taking a toll of over 150MB of RAM. I don't need to see the weather on the watch like probably the vast majority of your users!!! It used to be an OK app with high weather accuracy and nice graphs but not a very attractive and functional GUI (completely spoiled by the adherence to Google's material design). Now it's just not worth keeping it anymore. I paid for the Pro version but I'll uninstall it.
topReviews.reviewTitle: Uninstalled it due to the new changes!

topReviews.reviewText: I have been noticing more and more that the current weather around me is never the same as what weatherpro are stating it is?? When it is raining, weatherpro indicate that it is sunny and vice versa? Please fix this..
topReviews.reviewTitle: Better improvement required on current weather status

topReviews.reviewText: WeatherPro for iOS has the better precipitation statistics. (Combined probability + amount graphs and in particular summed up precipitation per day.) Will we have that on Android anytime soon? Thanks!
The Fuck Is WORNG here, I had buyed premium for 3 months but it hasn't been 2 weeks and already lost premium.

I paid for weather pro but you needing to pay again to enable the real "pro" features. What you offer in this version is widely offered by free apps..I guess for the price this should come with more.  Just an fyi    I paid for the app and I didn't download it for free.

Update: Still using this app which keeps imoroving-at least if you have the Pro version. Simple to use, lots of useful & accurate info and you can keep track of weather in several locations at once, which is very handy if you travel a lot.
Very useful app. Accurate, plenty of well-presented detail. Easy to add other locations almost anywhere in the world.
topReviews.reviewTitle: An essential app in yr pocket

topReviews.reviewText: I have a small problem the temperature sensor isn't working, is it my Note 3 or the application?

Dropped you from a 4 to a 3, every update deletes the widgets (stopped using the widgets) and i preferred the pop out satellite view and the ability to select locations without having to go back to favourites

I just paid for a full year and no features were unlocked.  Kept asking me to buy it again, as i have never paid for it.  I tried to contact them and there was no response and no emails and no reply. ... junk and scame. They take your money and don't give you anything. ...
I have used this app (premium) for quite a while and it is the best.

Paid for pro version, because i liked the description, downloaded it, but there is no additional options, widgets, anything which pro version offers. It's not much 1$, but its misleading because i feel that i gave money for nothing :(

The wind mode comes out really handy, and predictions are accurate! Great app worth it's price. The pro subscription, while less accurate in long term forecast is also great for planning my sailing journeys !
Every week now I get the same message saying weatherpro has stopped. You then have to go through signing up again and starting from scratch.  Get it sorted
As of today radar not working at all.
Bloody great app best weather i ever used. My son like it for his roofing jobs

Thanks for allowing the user to optionally show the map preview on startup. Still don't like the search button that only appears sometimes. I suggest you add the search to the location dropdown. Still too many clicks to change between Celcius and Fahrenheit. Seems to be feature to share a picture on social media but the camera flash is not activated.
topReviews.reviewTitle: No need for the UI update

topReviews.reviewText: Live in Brisbane, want the weather in Melbourne for the next 3 days. Just spent 10 pointless minutes trying to get it. Hopeless. Uninstalled.
I'm all for  getting notifications regarding weather alerts.  But it's sackless how when I do get one.  No matter what I do (clear notifications) it opens the app up.  Annoying.
Found it accurate and fast for any location that I wanted. Much more accurate than some of the alternatives.
Totally unintuitive. No simple search function. Says well known places are unknown. Rubbish.
How are they accessed after purchase?
When you get rid of ads in the Alerts Pro on which I spent money when I bought it intially.
Seems more accurate than most

Mixed feelings. App is very good, company hates its customers. Which is more important?  It depends on the day. Billing is convoluted and deceptive, which is the customer's fault apparently ,  but features are super-cool.  Roll the dice and see how it works out for you.
